exams.title: Exam 1
exams.description: Covers systems of linear equations, matrices, determinants, and vector spaces
exams.uncertainty: Exam date is during Week 6 (9/22-9/26), specific day not provided

exams.title: Exam 2
exams.description: Covers subspaces, linear independence, bases, dimension, change of basis, row/column space, and linear transformations

exams.title: Exam 1
exams.description: First midterm exam covering linear systems, matrices, determinants, and vector spaces
exams.uncertainty: Exam scheduled for Week 6 (9/22-9/26), specific day not provided

exams.title: Exam 2
exams.description: Second midterm exam covering subspaces, linear independence, bases, dimension, linear transformations, norms, inner products, and least squares
exams.uncertainty: Exam scheduled for Week 11 (10/27-10/31), specific day not provided

exams.title: Final Exam
exams.description: Comprehensive final exam covering all course material including eigenvalues, eigenvectors, diagonalization, and matrix factorizations
exams.uncertainty: Final exam on Thursday December 11, 12:10 - 2:00 PM
